column5: Was out the other day when I see a slight movement just downstream from me. Next thing I know this large deer jumps down from the high bank and swims to the other shore. Pretty cool end to a great day of fishing.
Very cool.  I thought you were going to say you saw a sasquatch or something  Joey

Tsk tsk tsk....taking your eye off your float...I can see it in the pic....LOL.  It was well worth it though...you don't see that every day!!  I suspect any fish that were in the area may have been a little spooked if it splashed a lot.  I was fishing an area last spring, when a dog jumped in the water....about 2 seconds later, I saw about 20 steelhead zoom by me...LOL.
